### getStatus() {#a5cefb47697de5a5d7ce1d84d706b9c6c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Status llvm::vfs::detail::anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;VirtualFileSystem.cpp&#125;::InMemoryHardLink::getStatus (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; RequestedName) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Return the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/status">Status</a></code> for this node.

<code>RequestedName</code> should be the name through which the caller referred to this node. It will override <code>Status::Name</code> in the return value, to mimic the behavior of <code>RealFile</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/virtualfilesystem-cpp/#l00694">694</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/virtualfilesystem-cpp">VirtualFileSystem.cpp</a>.
